entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
